message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to me and is worth $1500000 to my company. Given its significance, I am offering it to you at a special price tailored to your needs. Considering its worth to you, I propose to sell it to you for $1300000. This represents a significant saving of $200000 compared to its intrinsic value, making it an attractive proposition. I believe this price reflects the product's true worth while offering you an excellent deal. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
